alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 23 at 6:23AM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys and Salt Lake Valley. The heaviest snow is expected this morning, and will be heaviest across the Tooele Valley and the west end of the Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy, wet snow may put stress on trees and powerlines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
